channel.title: Most Helpful Members Section - July
channel.description:
This thread will be used to discuss the most helpful members for the month of July.
[u]Server Help[/u] [ul][li]Null Amount[/li][/ul]
[u]Web Design/Development[/u] [ul][li]Ruby[/li][li]RSCShadow[/li][/ul]
[u]General Programming[/u] [ul][li]Taharok[/li][/ul]

item.title: Most Helpful Members Section - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I looked into the Model Requests/Help section, the Graphic Requests and Help section, the RuneScape Discussion section, the MineCraft Discussion section and the Runescape Classic Server and Client Help but I couldn’t see any singular user who provided a lot of high-quality help. It would be interesting to nominate members from a wider range of sections but I guess that not all sections enjoy the same amount of activity.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Helpful Members Section - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I spotted Fire capez’s posts but a lot of them are very vague and don’t put the same effort in to help as all the other nominees do. I don’t want to damage the integrity of the other nominations and so Null Amount will be the only nominated user for this month.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Helpful Members Section - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

I’ve had a look through Null Amount’s posts and he puts a lot of effort into helping people in the Server Help section and so he’s my nomination for this month. I’ll continue looking through the Server Help section and look for any more nominees.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Helpful Members Section - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

There are two potential nominations for the General Programming section. I definitely think that Taharok has been consistently helpful in that section (keep up the good work if you’re reading this, Taharok :P) and so Taharok will definitely be one of those listed for that section.

The other potential nomination for this section is Lin but Lin doesn’t quite help as much as the others nominated and so I think that there will only be one member listed for this section, and so that will be Taharok.

Read full topic

item.title: Most Helpful Members Section - July
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Ruby and RSCShadow have once again been helpful in the Web Development section and so my nominations for that section are Ruby and RSCShadow.

Read full topic
